channel.title: Unrealscape 70% done but need help with somthing
channel.description:
Unrealscape is 70% done my first one...and ill be in the advertisements soon. But.. I need some help see the npcs are pissing me off i cant get them to go were i want them..yes cords and everything folwed tuts..but whenever i do somthing bame, its not working ill have 0hp...wont move...and certainly wont attack. 2nd question, im trying to learn how to make myself a mod on the game..so i can make others it too...(that was a noob question and im srry but can anyone answer??). 3rd question..get the barrows gloves to be weared on the hands not the weapon. If you help thx sooner i get this sooner u all will like the sever..
Heres some things...cw is were u pk...u get all items never save them.. Admins and mods are getting higherd but only mods..admin are tooken. All pots work..sharks work...all skills can be lvl to 135.. Also..antoher question will it be lvl 253 right? Anyways....there more to come but ill post new thing each 20% im closer..than the last night before released it shall be big testing...and i hope you help me and i hope u like my first sever thats comming out. Thx...oh yea dont and dont..ask for mods ill pick on first night it comes out...My very first sever and its new so if theres bugs dont get all in my face.. thx again... :D

item.title: Unrealscape 70% done but need help with somthing
item.dc:creator: @L_s_R L s R
item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

Q1 i have no idea -.-
Q2 go to your character folder and find your character find: character-rights = 0 Change it to: character-rights = 3 Makes you owner…
Q3 Go to auto-spawn (assuming your autospawning the npc’s) Find the npc you need, and change the HP/Coords

post back if it works

Read full topic
item.source: Unrealscape 70% done but need help with somthing

Unrealscape is 70% done my first one…and ill be in the advertisements soon. But…
